entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet SDK discovery accepts empty folders as valid SDKs #22322
  • The Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility package is missing a package description #22320
    7.0.1xx

Closed

  • VS 2015 support for ns2.0 causes conflicts with ref assembly facades #1539
    Backlog
  • Verify whether build logic for .NET Standard support needs to be added to Mono/Xamarin #1627
    3.0.1xx
  • [Product construction] SDK should overlay nuget onto the CLI LKG used for testing #1744
    3.0.1xx
  • Investigate dotnet store running package resolution in parallel on same project #2160
    3.0.1xx
  • Building a project between two different SDKs fails hard if you reuse nodes #2161
    3.0.1xx
  • ResolvePackageFileConflicts should normalize file paths #2331
    3.0.1xx
  • ResolvePackageAssets (and design-time build) fails badly inside VS if you have a project with malformed or empty target framework #2363
    3.0.1xx
  • Link for .NET Framework to non built-in .NET standard warning needs to point to actual content #2398
    3.0.1xx
  • Update CLI and revert implicit netcoreapp version workaround #2416
    3.0.1xx
  • Missing LatestPatchVersionForNetCore2_1 #2446
    3.0.1xx
  • Better diagnostics for misspelled `TargetFramework(Identifier|Version)?` #2461
    3.0.1xx
  • [Question] How to build SDK with specific version? (e.g. generate v5.0.401 but not v5.0.401-dev) #22332
  • Advertise the dynamic VS/SDK install folder change #9842
    3.0.1xx
  • Mac builds fail on "Hosted macOS" agent pool #2624
    3.0.1xx
  • Just installed the 2.2 preview 3 sdk - fails with MSB4018 #2635
    3.0.1xx
  • Duplicate embedded resource error for EmbeddedResource with different LogicalNames #2657
    3.0.1xx
  • Improve testing of PreserveCompilationContext with approximation of what Razor does for runtime compilation #2828
    3.0.1xx
  • ReferenceManagerAssemblies is hidden from .NETCoreApp but not .NETStandard #2996
    3.0.1xx
  • Adding User Experience for creating WinMDs on .NET Core #3042
    3.0.1xx
  • Internal error: new deps file generation logic did not produce the same result as the old logic #3146
    3.0.1xx
  • migrate newtonsoft.json to system.text.json in RegFreeComManifest.cs and ClsidMap.cs #3081
    3.0.1xx
  • Error when trying to run myWebApp #22328
  • The previous project cannot be run after upgrading to from .NET 6.0 RC2 arm64 to RTM arm64. #22125
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 has incorrect editor config files for AnalysisLevel 5 #22276
  • Cannot find dotnet/clicommandlineparser in the feed #10230
    3.0.1xx
  • Entering an unrecognized TFM crashes ResolvePackageAssets task during design-time builds #3286
    3.0.1xx
  • Change all aspnet feed #10314
    3.0.1xx
  • flaky test "It_stores_when_targeting_netcoreapp3" #3351
    3.0.1xx
  • Condition out NETStandard.Library.NETFramework for source-build #10372
    3.0.1xx
  • Preview link points to an unhelpful page #10386
    3.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22334
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools

Merged

  • Fix compatibility task paths in props and targets #22318
    Area-Compatibility

Updated

  • Add implicit RIDs when not specified on self contained option #22314
    Area-CLI
  • [NOMERGE]Argument BC(--r/--a), add support for `--arch` #22180
    Area-Infrastructure
